title: Star Guardian Syndra
body: There feels like theres a lto of lag when using her abilities with this skin. The abilities feel like there is a stutter

replies.body: Oh no!  Could be some issues with your game files trying to render.  Run a repair through the client or repatch via the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  That should fix things up, but test it in a custom game!
